description: Manages educational courses, lessons, topics, modules, assessments, feedback, and learner registrations. Handles course creation from Content Studio, personalized learning paths from Learner AI, and course structure management.

field_descriptions.course_id: Unique UUID identifier for the course
field_descriptions.course_description: Detailed description of the course content and objectives
field_descriptions.status: Course status: 'active' (published and available), 'archived' (no longer active), or 'draft' (not yet published)
field_descriptions.duration_hours: Estimated total duration of the course in hours
field_descriptions.start_date: Scheduled start date for the course (ISO 8601 timestamp)
field_descriptions.created_at: Timestamp when the course was created (ISO 8601)
field_descriptions.updated_at: Timestamp when the course was last modified (ISO 8601)
field_descriptions.created_by_user_id: UUID of the user who created the course (trainer UUID for marketplace courses, learner UUID for personalized courses)
field_descriptions.learning_path_designation: Metadata object indicating if course is part of a learning path, includes source (learner_ai), flow type (CAREER_PATH_DRIVEN), and competency target information
field_descriptions.ai_assets: Course-level AI enrichment assets including videos, GitHub repositories, and other curated resources

sample_data.course_description: Master server-side JavaScript development with Node.js, Express, and PostgreSQL. Learn to build scalable REST APIs, handle authentication, implement database migrations, and deploy production-ready applications.

videos.title: Node.js Event Loop Explained
videos.description: Deep dive into Node.js event loop architecture

repos.name: expressjs/express
repos.description: Fast, unopinionated, minimalist web framework for Node.js

notes: Course Builder manages hierarchical course structure: Course → Topics → Modules → Lessons
Each course can have multiple topics, each topic can have multiple modules, and each module contains lessons
learning_path_designation is a JSONB object that contains metadata for personalized courses created via Learner AI
ai_assets is a JSONB object containing course-level enrichment resources (videos, repos) that appear on all lesson pages
course_type 'learner_specific' indicates personalized courses created for individual learners
course_type 'trainer' indicates marketplace courses created by trainers and available to all learners
status 'active' courses are published and visible to learners, 'draft' courses are still being edited
The service also manages assessments, feedback, and registrations, but GRPC queries primarily return course data
